summary: This document consists of Bureau of Prisons count sheets, inmate rosters, and official count slips from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on August 13, 2019. It records inmate counts by housing unit and includes a roster entry for inmate Jeffrey Epstein (REG NO 76318-054) with a special assignment code for suicide watch or unassigned status.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed on the inmate roster with registration number 76318-054 and a special assignment code (HOSP) indicating suicide watch or unassigned status.

persons.context: Listed on the inmate roster with registration number 57084-056 and an assignment code (TNWDVR).

events.title: Daily inmate count at MCC New York
events.description: Routine official inmate count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, documenting the population in various housing units.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is dated August 13, 2019, the day after Jeffrey Epstein's death.
Jeffrey Epstein is listed with registration number 76318-054 and a special assignment code 'HOSP', which the document associates with 'SUICIDE OR UNASSO' (likely suicide watch or unassigned).
The prison conducted official inmate counts across multiple housing units (B-A, C-A, E-N, E-S, G-N, G-S, H-A, I-N, K-N, K-S, R-A, Z-A, Z-B) with a total population recorded.
The administrative forms include count sheets, rosters, and count slips, indicating standard prison operational procedures on that date.
